column4: i'm making symbolic link into /usr/local/bin/ but i can't access the command in terminal
you'll need to explain clearer than that
i was extracted package and to execute the exectuable file i made a link of that file into /usr/local/bin so i can access that executable without goinig into that directory and issuing ./***
ok, so it's not in your $PATH
please show me ls -la on the binary
please show me ls -la on the binary
and none of those commands are working in htere ?
you can't do that, you'll need a link to every binary
show me ls -la on two of the links in /usr/local/bin
ok, so then you need to create a symlink for every binary in /opt to an individual link in /usr/local/bin
you also need to confirm /usr/local/bin is in your $PATH
rox i will try recreating the link
just for record i try this day ago it was working
